title: Pop consumer with big queue num will case out of bounds problem
description:
What did you do (The steps to reproduce)?

  • create a topic with more than 127 read queues
  • pop message from broker
  • will find the queueId of popCheckPoint is not right
description_text:
What did you do (The steps to reproduce)?

create a topic with more than 127 read queues
pop message from broker
will find the queueId of popCheckPoint is not right
